lead_paragraph: “The Diary of a Teenage Girl” is an adaptation of Phoebe Gloeckner’s book about an unsupervised 15-year-old drifting through the druggy, polysexual Bay Area of the 1970s.
snippet: “The Diary of a Teenage Girl” is an adaptation of Phoebe Gloeckner’s book about an unsupervised 15-year-old drifting through the druggy, polysexual Bay Area of the 1970s.
